REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f2558 reute r f BC-NATIONAL-SEMI-<NSM>, 04-09 0063

TEXT.TITLE: NATIONAL SEMI <NSM>, CANON IN DEVELOPMENT PACT
TEXT.BODY: National Semiconductor Corp said it and Canon Inc <CANNY> plan to jointly develop integrated circuits and software products which will be manufactured by Canon. The first product will be a laser-beam printer for National's Series 32000 family of 32-bit microprocessor products, the company said. Reuter
